pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau Speaks with Prime Minister of Pakistan Nawaz Sharif | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
The Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, spoke today with the Prime Minister of Pakistan Nawaz Sharif. 

Prime Minister Trudeau offered his condolences for the loss of lives in the terrorist attack in Lahore, Pakistan on Easter Sunday, a sacred time for many families.  The two leaders agreed on the need to cooperate to counter the threat of terrorism globally.
